workspace.upload.title: Upload Your Photos
workspace.upload.description: Drag & drop photos or click to browse. Photos must have GPS location data.
workspace.upload.dropzone.idle: Drag & drop photos or click to browse
workspace.upload.dropzone.hint: Upload up to {{maxFiles}} photos. Each photo must be under {{maxSize}}MB.
workspace.upload.requirements.title: Photo Requirements:
workspace.upload.requirements.gps: Photos must contain GPS location data (EXIF)
workspace.upload.requirements.format: Supported formats: JPG, PNG, HEIC, WebP
workspace.upload.gpsStatusLegend: Green = GPS available, Yellow = No GPS
workspace.upload.gpsValidation: {{valid}} of {{total}} photos have valid GPS data
workspace.gps.title: GPS Data Extraction
workspace.gps.description: Extracting GPS coordinates from photo EXIF data to generate your trajectory.
workspace.gps.insufficientDataMessage: At least 2 photos with valid GPS coordinates are required to create a trajectory. Please upload more photos with location data.
workspace.gps.table.title: GPS Data Details
workspace.gps.preview.title: Trajectory Preview
workspace.replay.title: Trajectory Replay
workspace.replay.description: View and replay your journey on the map.
workspace.replay.completed: Replay completed! Click Play to restart.
workspace.replay.noDataMessage: At least 2 photos with valid GPS coordinates are required. Please go back and upload more photos.
workspace.status.completed: Replay completed! Click Play to restart.
explory.map.error.title: Map Loading Error
explory.map.error.description: Unable to load the map. Please try again later.
photos.select.title: Select Photos
photos.select.description: Select photos to add to the map
photos.supported.formats: Supported: JPG, PNG, HEIC, WebP, AVIF
photos.preview.title: Review Your Photos
photos.warning.no.gps.title: Some photos lack GPS data
photos.warning.no.gps.description: {{count}} photo(s) don't have GPS information and will be skipped.
photos.error.no.gps.title: No GPS Data Available
photos.error.no.gps.description: All selected photos lack GPS information. Please select photos with location data.
photos.processing.title: Processing Photos
photos.complete.title: Processing Complete!
photos.complete.description: Photos have been added to the map.
